newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Duma wants limit on foreigners in metal sector.
newsitem.headline: Duma wants limit on foreigners in metal sector.

text.p: Russia's State Duma lower house of parliament, in a first reading on Friday, passed amendments to the law on foreign investment which call for limits on foreign investment in precious metals and stones output and refining.
The amendments do not become law until the Duma passes them in a total of three readings, and must also be approved by the Federation Council upper house and President Boris Yeltsin.
